content.question: The style of the relief sculpture on the tympanum is best demonstrated as Romanesque through the

choices.label: heavily stylized figures that are depicted either frontally or in composite poses
representation of the figures using a realistic scale and classical proportions
dynamic motion suggested by elongated figural forms with graceful gestures and stances
figures that are arranged in a compact composition with an emphasis on linear patterns

content.answer: heavily stylized figures that are depicted either frontally or in composite poses

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
